attributes.action:
Have more provision and support for our SEND children.
More Schools for SEND
attributes.additional_details:
Things need to change urgently, teachers need to except inclusion rather than except the funding and let these children fail.
There’s no support for these children, most of the schools supposed SEN team are not trained.
School right now are being able to discriminate and target these children with a disability.
This is abuse, this is politically incorrect families and children are suffering all over the UK and you need to hear us speak!
attributes.background:
The provision for inclusion in this country is appalling , special needs children are being targeted and abused and discriminated against.
These children are excluded from schools with no education and left to fail because they are different …give more to SEND children there lives matter too .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for a similar action:

Fund increased support for SEN children in mainstream schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637624

Fund the provision of smaller schools for those with complex SEND
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642005

Fund additional support for children who may have SEND
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/645580
